Inflation has moved much closer to our 2% longer run goal. We are committed to maintaining our economy's strength by supporting maximum employment and returning inflation to our 2% goal. To that end today, the Federal Open Market Committee decided to take another step in reducing the degree of policy restraint by lowering our policy interest rate by a quarter percentage point.
